name: Δ Time
description:
Our dungeon crawler Δ Time (Delta Time) is a third person game which takes place in space, with atmospheric colors and glowing effects in a lit artsy pixelated style which uses interesting gameplay mechanics.

  • Time moves only when you move, so take your time and fight in style!
  • The only way to get into the next room is by killing your enemies.
  • You can charge your attack (3x) to make more damage.
  • Your health is not gonna regenerate! Once you die you will get back to the start of the game.
  • Beat the Highscore. Rooms and enemies are endless.

You play as a naked dude in space encircled by a bunch of evil aliens.
Sounds like a lot of fun, don’t you think?

P.S. Beware of the moving wall 😜
Please use a xbox controller 🎮

Δ Time is the final bachelor project created by students of Salzburg University of Applied Sciences (👽👽👽MMA + 👽MMT)
